name: NewYorker
text: Personal-productivity systems like Getting Things Done don’t address the insidiously haphazard way that work unfolds at the organizational level; they only help individuals cope with its effects. https://t.co/JaouUGesbm

name: NewYorker
text: We know precisely how dangerous the continued combustion of hydrocarbons is, and we have seen that there are affordable alternatives. Why do ad agencies and P.R. firms produce campaigns that say otherwise? https://t.co/kSHgxAblao

name: NewYorker
text: Toby Ord, a philosopher who studies our species’ collective fate, considers both the grim futures that await us if existential threats to humanity aren’t addressed and the far more promising outcomes that become possible if they are. https://t.co/R8MV13JsLA
